attributes.action: Abolish Road Tax and display valid MOT and Insurance Disks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are petitioning you to scrap the current road taxing system in favour of a system where all vehicles using Britain’s roads are required to display valid MOT and Insurance certificates. 

The road tax system is flawed in so much as a vehicle can be taxed for a year even in the MOT runs out next month. The same applies to insurance. Given the reported figures of uninsured drivers and that the current system does next to nothing to close this loophole, in fact it actually helps the people in question to drive around without paying expensive insurance costs. This then increases the insurance costs of the people who are fully legal on the roads.

The systems used for tracking down untaxed cars can be easily adapted to track down cars without valid MOT & Insurance certificates. 

Lets make changes now and get some positive results to reduce the problems of cars and drivers who are illegally using Britain’s roads.

Sign this petition as a vote for common sense.
